mapper.select: select nvl(max(comment_num), 0) + 1 as next_id from board_comment
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment (comment_content, comment_num, userid, num, comment_date) values (#{comment_content}, (select nvl(max(comment_num)+1,1) from board_comment), #{userid}, #{num}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: select * from board_comment where num=#{num} order by comment_date
mapper.delete: delete from board_comment where userid=#{userid} and comment_num=#{comment_num} and num=#{num}
